articles.description: It will be interesting to see if Oppo's "sliding-phone" makes it to the market similar to what LG did with Wing which has a swiveling screen
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | 
December 16, 2020 12:15:08 pm

articles.title: 500km/h Hennessey Venom F5 targets world speed record - Motoring
articles.description: The road-going version of the Hennessey Venom F5 has emerged with what’s billed as the world’s most powerful production car engine – a 1355kW 6.6-litre twin-turbocharged V8 designed to send the new American hypercar to a top speed of more than 500km/h. The to…
